Metadata.title: Opale-concept - Freelance Web Developer
Metadata.description: Freelance Web Developer - Creation of modern and efficient websites

OpenSource.title: We are open source
OpenSource.caption: This site is based on a Next.js TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Radix UI front-end and a Directus back-end. The code is available on GitHub, so don't hesitate to use it or contribute!

RegistrationPage.emailExistsError: A user with this email already exists.

RequestResetPasswordForm.title: Reset your password
RequestResetPasswordForm.description: Enter your registered email and a reset password link will be sent to you
RequestResetPasswordForm.errorMessage: An error occurred, please try again!
RequestResetPasswordForm.successMessage: If an account with this email exists, a password reset link has been sent.

RequestResetForm.title: Provide a new password for your account
RequestResetForm.description: Enter your new password for your account
RequestResetForm.successMessage: Password successfully reset, redirecting you to login page...
RequestResetForm.errorMessage: An error occurred, please try again!
